body.name: JOOFO Floor Lamp,30W/2400LM Sky LED Modern Torchiere 3 Color Temperatures Super Bright -Tall Standing Pole Light with Remote & Touch Control for Living Room,Bed Room,Office (Pearl White)
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 55 mins
features: Multiple Control Ways:With the remote control, you can easily control the floor lamp without leaving the sofa and warm bed (with a 32.8ft/10m range).Add-on touch control, stepless brightness adjustment(brightness from 5% to 100%) by long touch.

Using-Life Longer 20% than Others:With high brightness and low heat LED advanced technology, it has the brightness of a 200W incandescent lamp.Long-term use will not heat up as it's made up of the acrylic materials.the light has a lifetime of up to 100,000 hours at the right current and voltage, which means lower maintenance and replacement costs, totally save money and energy.

Three Color Temperatures and Stepless Dimming:The JOOFO floor lamp has stepless brightness adjustment as well as three adjustable color-temperature settings from 3000K to 5000K, for warm white, natural white, and cool white light. It remembers your settings between uses and when power is interrupted.

Save Space and Safe Base:The base is very heavy.Safe for your baby and pets.The base to provide a good stability from falling that can make sure safety and stable.And save space design,you can put it under your sofa or narrow corners.350 rotation you can adjust any angle you need it to make the light fit you.

Directional and Glare-Free Light:The lighted surface can be rotated through 350 degrees and tilted to any angle between straight up and almost parallel to the floor. The 69inch/175cm height and tiltable top make it easy to avoid glare from the lighted surface. Pointed into a corner, the lamp provides great diffuse lighting when you’re on camera for remote meetings.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Super Bright 30W/2400LM floor lamp enough to light a large room.It pivots any direction that you need it to meet your different needs Memory Function You don't need to adjust the lighting you like by many times,Just turn it on!It has restored your previous light setting Safety&Stable It’s weighted base and sturdy design makes it safe for your children.Large-area metal material with good heat dissipation,keep cool to touch

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Two Litt Up Large Room
reviews.reviewText: I bought two floor lamps to light up our large Piano room and they did the job perfectly. There are no more shadows, the music and Piano keyboard are lit well, and the color temperature selection feature allowed me to match other lighting in our home. We don’t use the remotes after setup since we power the lamps from outlets controlled by the room light switch. Note each remote controls only it’s respective lamp. Assembly was easy and the lamps are sturdy. We placed the lamps in two corners of the room pointing straight up. We like the sleek, modern design, the bright light output on the highest setting, and that they don’t take up much room, fitting easily behind accent chairs. Though the head of the lamps can pivot, I found when angling the light toward the center of the room it was painful on the eyes to look back into those corners toward the tilted lamp heads—plenty of light was reflected into the room with the lamp head pointe straight up and that eliminated any eye strain from looking into the lamp heads. My wife and I love these floor lamps. They exceeded our expectations in quality, setup, sturdiness, fit/finish, style/design, easy of use, and brightness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect lamp for lighting up whole room
reviews.reviewText: My girlfriend and I recently purchased this lamp, and we were so impressed that we ended up buying a second one! This lamp has truly exceeded our expectations in terms of both functionality and design.One of the standout features of this lamp is the convenience of the included remote control. It has quickly become an indispensable part of our daily life. Whether we're winding down for a movie night, reading, or just relaxing, being able to adjust the lighting from the comfort of our couch or bed is a game-changer. The remote control is intuitive and responsive, making it incredibly easy to set the perfect ambiance.In terms of design, it fits seamlessly into our home decor. Its sleek and modern look adds a touch of elegance to our living space without taking up much room. The build quality is robust, assuring us that it's built to last.But it's not just the convenience; this lamp excels in performance as well. It does an outstanding job of lighting up our entire room. The brightness is just right, and the adjustable settings allow us to create a cozy, inviting atmosphere or a well-lit space for work or chores. The versatility of this lamp is simply impressive.In fact, we were so pleased with our first purchase that we decided to buy a second lamp for another room. It's safe to say that we are absolutely thrilled with this product. These lamps have not only added convenience to our lives but have also enhanced the overall ambiance of our home. If you're in the market for a stylish, versatile, and user-friendly lamp, this is the one to go for. We can't recommend it enough!In summary, this lamp has been a fantastic addition to our home, and we couldn't be happier with our decision to purchase it. Its convenience, performance, and design are top-notch, and we're now enjoying it in multiple rooms. Don't hesitate to get one for yourself – you won't be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not stable. Works with Amazon smart plug. I’m very satisfied with the purchase.
reviews.reviewText: This is the fourth pole lamp I’ve put together in the past 6 weeks. The others were through the Vine program, but I liked the concept and purchased this lamp for its added brightness.Likes:Brighter than similar lamps. Three different light settings.Simple to operate.Comes with its own remote control.Works with Amazon smart plug.Very good directions.Dislike.Not stable at all. Not recommended if placed where it can be bumped.Overall.Simplicity of this lamp.Two of the other lamps I ordered were classified as smart lamps, operated through software installed on your phone. Negative comments on those were by people that just wanted an easy to operate lamp. This lamp is easy to operate and there is no app to download. I added an Amazon smart plug to the other smart lamp for simplicity I lost some features but I just wanted simplicity. This lamp works perfectly with an Amazon smart plug, for those that don’t want to be tied to a remote. You do need the remote to adjust brightness.Stability. All of the lamps that I ordered were in the range of 10 pounds. Although the base seems heavy, the lamps are so tall they are not stable. Great for a no pet, no child household, or if placed in a secure location.Assembly. I recommend placing the lamp on the floor with a pillow under the bulb part. The base props the lamp up and using a pillow on the other end levels it off and makes assembly easier. There was a loose nut in the box with no direction on using the nut. It did go on under the base. Probably not needed. There does appear to be excess cord between the bulb part and the top tube. Slowly pulling the cord at the base removes the slack. The cord, or wiring, runs through every piece. That takes guesswork away. On other smart lamps that I ordered there is a separate tube with no cord running through it. The directions were on those were poor. I placed the separate piece at the bottom, it belonged at the top, and pulled the excess cord. The wiring split. Trashed the lamp. After that learning experience, I ordered another lamp and assembled it easily.Adapter. This is important. The directions state not to use any other adapter. On one of the other lamps I ordered, a less expensive one, the adapter was missing. I used another adapter that I had, and blew the lamp. I trashed it. Another reviewer had the same experience. No adapter in the box, used another adapter, the wire started melting.The remote. Initially it didn’t work. I reread the directions. It said the remove the film on the battery. I hadn’t noticed any film. I removed the film and presto, it worked perfectly.I can recommend this lamp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I would give this 10 stars if I could. I love the brightness, its heavy and well made. I love the remote which makes it so convenient to use and the dimmer feature is a plus. Very chic!
material de calidad, excelente lampara...hoy en día ya todo parece desechable, pero esta vale mucho la pena aun su precio.
Me gustó los tres tonos de luz que tiene , además de la facilidad con la que se maneja. Un poco cara y quizá un poquito mas de intensidad en la luz.

reviews.reviewTitle: Get this if you want a remote for a floor lamp!
reviews.reviewText: I love this floor lamp because of the brightness and, most importantly, the remote. There are cheaper floor lamps for less than $100 that are perfectly fine. However, if you plan to keep the floor lamp in a harder-to-reach place, you want the remote to control the light. The base is quite heavy and sturdy, which means that the light's foundation is solid. It looks sleek, elegant, and well-made. Make sure you get a holder for the remote control to ensure you do not misplace it!

reviews.reviewTitle: Good product and seller is an easy talker
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my friend as her house living room doesn't have lights. she loves the light as it can switch to different color of lights and can light up or down with the remote. It's easy to talk to the seller. my questions were quick responded.
